snippet: Rather than attend free government school, children of day laborers and rickshaw drivers pay $3 a month to be taught by teens.
abstract: Rather than attend free government school, children of day laborers and rickshaw drivers pay $3 a month to be taught by teens.
lead_paragraph: Second-grade teacher Shaziya Begum paced through the classroom, read a story to her students and managed to hold the attention of the 7-year-olds long enough to ward off anarchy.

headline.main: At M.A. Ideal School, Teenage Teachers, Hopeful Parents
